Issue.creator: elli-androulaki
Issue.summary: As a token infrastructure (peer) developer, I want to define the part of the prover peer GRPC service interface that accommodates list tokens requests
Issue.description: Definition of peer interface for accommodating _list tokens requests_ (i.e., computation of list of tokens owned by the request originator) on GRPC side and mockup implementation of a prover peer's _listing tokens_ interface.
